intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides a comprehensive guide to the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Urban Atlas Building Block Height Model (UA BBHM) product, specifically for the 2012 reference year. It details the product's scope, covering 870 cities and urban centres within the EEA38 region, and the methodology employed to generate harmonised building height data. Furthermore, the manual explains the UA BBHM's characteristics, quality assessment procedures, potential applications in urban analysis, and its utility for supporting evidence-based policy decisions.
